Name: Imperator Automatic Weaponry
Details: For many years Imperator Automatic Weaponry was a subsidiary of Kallon Industries and before that, Earthwerks Incorporated. In 3056 Kallon separated from Earthwerks and Imperator Automatic Weaponry was spun off into its own independent company. Imperator Automatic Weaponry is one of the largest manufacturers of weaponry in the Inner Sphere.
